nodes.text: The Triple Dark (French: Triples Ténèbres) is the second installment in the Star Wars Resistance chapter books series, a series of French language junior novels written by Vanessa Rubio-Barreau that adapt episodes of Star Wars Resistance Season One. The Triple Dark was published by Hachette Jeunesse on April 17, 2019 and adapts the Star Wars Resistance episode of the same name.

As Kaz finds his feet on the Colossus, Jarek Yeager gives him his first mission: to repair Hallion Nark's ship. The problem is, Kaz doesn't know anything about being a mechanic. And he's a spy now, he has more important things to do! Besides, he doesn't trust this Hallion Nark… what if he was the First Order's mole?
